Name: Stone it!
About the game: Stone it! - A logic game in which you have to roll a block to the goal. Solve puzzles with buttons, clear the road with lasers and lower bridges - do everything to reach the goal. Beautiful locations add variety to levels, and winding paths make passing interesting and train logical thinking. And most importantly, remember - there is always a solution, you just need to find it! Good luck!
